id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to remedy an illegal property chain (replacing it with an existing non-chained property) in the definition of market capitalization.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to remedy an illegal property chain (replacing it with an existing non-chained property) in the definition of market capitalization.

id: constituent of a basket of credit risks
name: constituent of a basket of credit risks

id: indicates the notional amount represented by the index when it is first constituted
name: indicates the notional amount represented by the index when it is first constituted

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to loosen the restriction on a reference index to simply reference any weighted basket so that one could include commodity indices, for example.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to loosen the restriction on a reference index to simply reference any weighted basket so that one could include commodity indices, for example.

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to address text processing hygiene issues.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to address text processing hygiene issues.

id: indicates a premium payable for a contract based on the index
name: indicates a premium payable for a contract based on the index

id: An index is a function based on a set of structured calculations with respect to a basket of credit risks, financial instruments or other indices over time. Analysis may be computed based on historical values, projected values, etc.
name: An index is a function based on a set of structured calculations with respect to a basket of credit risks, financial instruments or other indices over time. Analysis may be computed based on historical values, projected values, etc.

id: This ontology defines market indices as hypothetical portfolios of investment holdings that correspond to some segment of the financial market, whose value is determined by the prices of the underlying holdings. Coverage includes credit indices, security-based indices, economic indicator based indices, and combinations thereof.
name: This ontology defines market indices as hypothetical portfolios of investment holdings that correspond to some segment of the financial market, whose value is determined by the prices of the underlying holdings. Coverage includes credit indices, security-based indices, economic indicator based indices, and combinations thereof.

id: number of shares outstanding x price per share
name: number of shares outstanding x price per share

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate deprecations that are more than 6 months old and to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate deprecations that are more than 6 months old and to replace content that is now available in the OMG Commons Ontology Library (Commons) v1.1 (FND-380).

id: specifies a formal name for the index
name: specifies a formal name for the index

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) rather than the OMG's Languages, Countries and Codes (LCC), eliminating redundancies in FIBO as appropriate.

id: basket of securities whose constituents are listed shares
name: basket of securities whose constituents are listed shares

id: indicates the monetary amount representing the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date
name: indicates the monetary amount representing the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date

id: specifies a fee payable by any party that wishes to participate in a contract based on the index after the start of its life
name: specifies a fee payable by any party that wishes to participate in a contract based on the index after the start of its life

id: the range of credit spread for the constituents of the index
name: the range of credit spread for the constituents of the index

id: Such an index does not necessarily reference a static portfolio, as there may be provisions for replacing defaulted securities on which the index depends.
name: Such an index does not necessarily reference a static portfolio, as there may be provisions for replacing defaulted securities on which the index depends.

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to reflect the move of hasTerm from FinancialInstruments to Contracts.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to reflect the move of hasTerm from FinancialInstruments to Contracts.

id: weighting function derived from the relative market capitalization (share price times the number of shares outstanding) of the companies tracked by an index
name: weighting function derived from the relative market capitalization (share price times the number of shares outstanding) of the companies tracked by an index

id: reference index that is a function of credit events that change the value of an underlying portfolio
name: reference index that is a function of credit events that change the value of an underlying portfolio

id: indicates the ranking of this debt instrument with respect to the credit index as a whole
name: indicates the ranking of this debt instrument with respect to the credit index as a whole

id: indicates the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date
name: indicates the market capitalization of some issuer as of some date

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to eliminate the restriction on reference index that it has an index value - the restriction should be on the quantity value such that the value refers to the indicator it represents.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to eliminate the restriction on reference index that it has an index value - the restriction should be on the quantity value such that the value refers to the indicator it represents.

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to use the Commons Ontology Library (Commons) Annotation Vocabulary rather than the OMG's Specification Metadata vocabulary.

id: benchmark whose constituents are exclusively equity instruments
name: benchmark whose constituents are exclusively equity instruments

id: Note that the risk related to a given constituent may be calculated based on either (1) the overall credit risk associated with the entity or, (2) the combined risk associated with an entity and the specific instrument identified, or (3) risk associated with the instrument on its own. Criteria for constituents is based on sectors (emerging market, financial, sovereign, etc), spread range (investment grade, non-investment grade), or asset type (loan, bond, mortgage-backed, asset-backed), second criteria is based on maturity of protection (2,3,5,7,10 yrs). Markit manages over 2000 CDS indexes, for example.
name: Note that the risk related to a given constituent may be calculated based on either (1) the overall credit risk associated with the entity or, (2) the combined risk associated with an entity and the specific instrument identified, or (3) risk associated with the instrument on its own. Criteria for constituents is based on sectors (emerging market, financial, sovereign, etc), spread range (investment grade, non-investment grade), or asset type (loan, bond, mortgage-backed, asset-backed), second criteria is based on maturity of protection (2,3,5,7,10 yrs). Markit manages over 2000 CDS indexes, for example.

id: measure of change in the value of the contents of a basket over a given period of time
name: measure of change in the value of the contents of a basket over a given period of time

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add the details needed to calculate market cap for a capitalization-based weighting function.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of this ontology was revised to add the details needed to calculate market cap for a capitalization-based weighting function.

id: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate punning in the definition of market cap.
name: BasketIndices.rdf version of the ontology was modified to eliminate punning in the definition of market cap.

id: specifies the value of a given index as of the release date
name: specifies the value of a given index as of the release date

id: basket of instruments, legal entities, or a combination thereof collected for the purpose of analyzing risk
name: basket of instruments, legal entities, or a combination thereof collected for the purpose of analyzing risk

id: expression representing the perceived value of a company as determined by the stock market at a specific point in time
name: expression representing the perceived value of a company as determined by the stock market at a specific point in time
